1.title: Living in Thailand for 1 Year vs. 10 Years
1.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. We took a video that compares someone who has lived in Thailand for one year with someone who has lived in the country for 10 years. It's really different. Enjoy our video. Thanks.

2.title: Koreans React to Thai Beverages
2.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. Today, we'll be showing you our Korean friends' reaction to Thai beverages. There were diverse responses. Enjoy.

3.title: Koreans React to Taste of Mama Tomyam
3.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. In today's video, some of our Korean friends will be trying Thai Mama Tomyam. Would they like it? Let's check it out in this video.

4.title: Korean vs. Thai: Spicy Food Challenge
4.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. In today's video, we are having a match of eating spicy foods with Thai friends. Both Korean and Thai people are famous with eating spicy foods well. Don't you wonder who will be the winner? Let's check it out in this video.

5.title: Koreans Rate Thai Male Celebrities Part 1
5.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. In today's video, we're going to show you Koreans' favorite Thai male celebrities. Guess who will win.

6.title: Koreans Rate Thai Male Celebrities Part 2
6.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. In today's video, we're going to show you Koreans' favorite Thai male celebrities. We went to Hongdae and asked people to choose their favorite Thai male celebrities. Guess who will win.

7.title: Koreans Rate Thai Male Celebrities Part 3
7.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. In today's video, we're going to show you Koreans' favorite Thai male celebrities. This is the semi-final!. Mario vs. DJ Puth, Mark vs. Dome. Guess who will win.

8.title: Koreans Rate Thai Male Celebrities: The Final Round!
8.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. Finally, the match has been settled. The final match was Mario vs. Dome. Who will be the winner?

9.title: Learning Thai, Korean & Chinese
9.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. In today's video, we're going to show you different Thai, Korean and Chinese words and sentences. Specifically, we'll teach you what to say when you want to get the phone number of someone you like. Hope you enjoy this video.

10.title: Koreans React to Thai Beer
10.plot: Hello, we're Oppa Kkaoli. Today, we'll steal your 7 minutes - You can't say Thai without the beer, right? My Korean friends taste the beers of Thailand. Hope you enjoy this video.

imdb.title: Oppa Kkaoli
plot: Hi. We are _Oppa Kkaoli_ (qv). Do you know Thai culture? Do you know Korean culture? We are here to tell you all about their similarities and differences. See if you already know these facts or share with us what you learned from our videos.
